nodes.text: Mistryl Assault Troopers were specialized members of the Mistryl Shadow Guard. Several of these troopers guarded the Mistryl safe house on Naboo in 1 ABY.

Mistryl Assault Troopers are Non-Player Characters (NPCs) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. They were added along with the Mistryl safe house as part of the Azure Cabal questline. Their name is misspelled "Mystril" in the game.
